name: Crystal Growth
description:
Crystal Growth is a Kenny Game Jam entry for 2022.

So, it's a download - yes, not very user friendly, but with Unreal, that's what it is.

If you do download, just unzip anywhere and click the exe.  It does take a few seconds to start up.

There are five levels, and if you get through without dying, it just repeats.

You need to shoot the crystal rocks to destroy them and collect the crystals. Once your crystal line is full, you need to find a barrel to dump them in (just stand next to it) and repeat three times for each level.

BUT, there are robots (they look like cute dogs!) that will try to stop you.

Thanks for playing!
